author: Inside Edition
description: The wife of legendary actor Dick Van Dyke says she is being targeted by a stalker. Arlene Silver claims the stalker has been following her for several months and that she recently confronted him outside her yoga class. The claim comes days after her husband celebrated his 100th birthday. Meanwhile, Prince William and Princess Kate's Christmas card has been revealed. It pictures the royal couple with their three children, George, Charlotte and Louis.
title: Dick Van Dyke's Wife, Arlene Silver, Says She Is Being Stalked

author: Inside Edition
description: Debra Newton was on the lam for most of her life. Police say she left her husband in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1983, taking her 3-year-old daughter, Michelle, with her. Michelle, now 45 years old, spoke with Inside Edition. The search for little Michelle was a big story. Flyers were mailed to 53 million homes.  A tip on Crime Stoppers led police to the runaway mom after 42 years. The runaway mom is facing charges of custodial interference and is free on bail. Newton has pled not guilty.
title: Woman Arrested After 42 Years On The Lam

author: Inside Edition
description: A mockumentary-style clip shows Nick Reiner walking around his neighborhood, expressing disturbing thoughts, and wandering the Brentwood estate where he allegedly killed his parents. He made the video in 2016 while he and his father, film director Rob Reiner, were promoting their new film "Being Charlie," loosely based on Nick's struggles with drug abuse. Inside Edition spoke to retired LAPD officer Jeff Wenninger who says he's been inside the Reiner estate many times.
title: Unearthed Video Shows Nick Reiner Expressing Disturbing Thoughts

author: Inside Edition
description: World renowned addiction expert Dr. Drew Pinsky spoke out Thursday about whether the slain Reiners could have done more to save themselves. Rob and Michele Reiner had sent their son, Nick, to rehab 18 times, and he lived in their guest house, but Dr. Pinsky says tough love may have been more effective. Dr. Leslie Dobson, a clinical and forensic psychologist, says having a successful father may have caused resentment in the struggling filmmaker.
title: Addiction Expert Dr. Drew Pinsky Speaks Out On Nick Reiner

author: Inside Edition
description: It's a miracle no one was hurt when this Statue of Liberty replica went toppling over due to high winds. It reportedly happened in a department store parking lot in Brazil.
title: Statue Of Liberty Replica Toppled By Wind In Brazil #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: A community gathered to find a 5-year-old autistic boy who wandered away from a playground. It happened in Georgia and the Gwinnett County Police responded to the emergency. Officials say about 40 minutes into the search, an officer spotted a fence that had been pulled up near a retention pond. Inside Edition Digital’s Mara Montalbano has more.
title: Cops Rescue 5-Year-Old Boy From Storm Drain In Georgia

author: Inside Edition
description: Just days after the Brown University shooting, MIT professor Nuno Loureiro was gunned down at his home in Brookline, Massachusetts.
title: Why Was MIT Professor Gunned Down? #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: Alanna Zabel taught yoga to Nick Reiners when he was 8 years old, and she says the experience was so disturbing, she wrote a children's book about it.
title: Nick Reiner's Yoga Teacher Describes 'Disturbing' Experience #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: An incredible discovery was made in Italy, dinosaur tracks in a mountainside. Reports say a nature photographer spotted them during an outing at Stelvio National Park. Thousands of footprints, determined to date back to the Triassic period. Paleontologists have been studying the marks that are difficult to get to in a remote area of the park. Experts say they belonged to bipedal herbivores with long necks. Inside Edition Digital’s Mara Montalbano has more.
title: Dinosaur Footprints Found In Italian National Park
